src_original: ābodheḥ śaraṇaṃ yāmi buddhaṃ dharmmaṃ gaṇottamam |
triṣkālaṃ gurave kiñcit dattvā bhaktyā(ktiṃ)  ca vandayet ||
sukhīṃ prāsādiko dhanyaḥ sukhāvatyāṃ sa jāyate ||
om svabhāvaśuddhe āhara āhara āgaccha āgaccha dharmma dhātugarbhe svāhā |
om namo bhagavate vairocanaprabharājāya tathāgatāyārhate samyaksambuddhāya,  tadyathā,
iti gāthayā pratiṣṭhāṃ kṛtvā om mano bhagavate ratnaketurājāya tathāgatāyārhate samyaksambuddhāya,  tadyathā,
om ratne ratne mahāratne ratnavijaye svāhā ityanena caityavandanāṃ kuryyāt |
etatsarvvaviśiṣṭapariṇāmanayā pariṇāmyamānaṃ viśiṣṭaphalāvāhakaṃ bhavatīti |  prajñāpāramitoktena mahāpariṇāmena pariṇāmayeta |
prajñāpāramitā hi pañcapāramitānāṃ svabhāvaḥ | ata eva -  sarvākāravaropetā śūnyateti nigadyate |
prajñāpāramitāvirahitāḥ pañcapāramitāḥ pāramitānāmadheyaṃ na labhante |  āryyavimalakīrttinirddeśe coktam |  prajñārahita upāyo bandhaḥ,  upāyarahitā prajñā bandhaḥ,
vakṣye kudṛṣṭinirghātamādikarmmavidhānataḥ |  anenaiva vihāreṇa yatnena labhate padam ||
prajñāsahita upāyo mokṣa[:],  upāyasahitā prajñā mokṣaḥ |
samanvāhara bhadantācāryya ahamitthaṃnāmā amukanāmā upāsako buddhaṃ dharmmaṃ saṅghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi yāvadābodhimaṇḍataḥ |
samanvāhara ācāryya ahamamukanāmopāsaka imāṃ belāṃ upādaya yāvat śva[: ]
tatra āśaya adhimuktiprayogaḥ bhūmiprapannaprayogaśca (ñca)  vasitāptiparyyantaḥ hetvavasthāsthitānāṃ śaikṣāṇāṃ suviśuddhādikarmmāvidhānena sambhāradvayasambhṛtasamyaksambodhisampallābhaḥ |
sūryyodayamihāntare sarvvaprāṇibadhāt parasvaharaṇāt abrahmacaryyāt tathā vāgbhedāt anṛtātmatvo (do)
pajananāt pānāt vikālāśanā[t]mālāvarṇakanṛtyagītalabhitāt śayanāsanāducchritāt adyāhaṃ virataḥ karomyahaṃ tāvat,
tgt_original: དུས་མ་ཡིན་པར་ཟ་བ་དང་། ཕྲེང་བ་དང་། ཁ་དོག་དང་། གླུ་དང་གར་དང་། རྩེ་འཇོ་དང་། ཁྲི་སྟན་དང་། ཁྲི་སྟན་ཆེན་པོ་ལས་ལྡོག་པར་བགྱིའོ་༎

src_original: gṛhapatibodhisattvastu ratnatrayaśaraṇapuraḥsaraṃ prāṇātipātāt adattādānāt kāmamithyācārāt mṛṣāvādāt prakṛtisāvadyāt madyapānāt ca pañcabhyo virataḥ śrutivivekasampanno gṛhapatibodhisattvaḥ parihṛtadaśākuśalaḥ punarakaraṇasambaravān kuśalakarmmacārī prātaḥprahare samutthāya mukhaśaucādikaṃ kṛtvā ratnatrayamanusmaran om āḥ hū ityanena ātmayogarakṣāṃ kṛtvā yathādhigamadhyānajapasaṃstavādikaṃ kuryyāt |
tadanu om jambhalajalendrāya svāhā ityanena parijaptvā '
tato namaḥ samantabuddhānāṃ sarvvatathāgatāvalokini om sambhara sambhara hū phaṭ svāhā iti mantraṃ saptavārān āvarttya prasāritadakṣiṇakarāṅgulapañcakavinirgatāmṛtapañcadhārābhi[:

adhyāsaṅgaparilakṣaṇāmupekṣāṃ ca vibhāvya sarvvasattvārthodyuktacetā pariśuddhena gomayena viśuddhena ca vāriṇā om āḥ vajjarekhe hū iti maṇḍalādhiṣṭhitabhūbhāge caturasrādi caturṇāmanyatamamabhimatamaṇḍalakaṃ kṛtvā tanmadhye viśvavarṇāṣṭadalakamalavaraṭake sūryyamaṇḍalopari nīlahūkārapariniṣpannaṃ bhūsparśamudrādharaṃ kṛṣṇavarṇaṃ akṣobhyam ,
tadanu pūrvvadale śukla om kāraniṣpannaṃ śuklavarṇaṃ bodhyaṅgau (grī)  mudrādharaṃ vairocanam,

tato dakṣiṇadale pītatrākārajaṃ pītavarṇaṃ varadamudrādharaṃ ratnasambhavam,  tataḥ paścimadale raktahrī ḥ kārasambhūtaṃ raktavarṇaṃ samādhimudrādharaṃ amitābham,  tata uttaradale śyāmakhakārajaṃ śyāmavarṇamabhayamudrādharamamoghasiddhiṃ ca bhāvayitvā,

aśaikṣāṇāmapi nirastapratipakṣatattvaphalavikalpānāṃ śākyamuneriva praṇidhānavegasāmarthyāt yuganaddhānābhogayogataḥ sattvārthakriyālakṣaṇamavicchinnamādikarmma pravarttata eva iti sthitam | tathā ca -
namo buddhāya gurave namo dharmmāya tāyine |
